verses.verse: And the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> also <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> to dwell in other <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%>, that willingly <S%H5068>offered<s%> themselves to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Now these are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: but in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H272>possession<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, to <S%H3478>wit<s%>, Israel, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> certain of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>. Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; <S%H6265>Athaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalaleel<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%>;

And <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1263>Baruch<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3626>Col<s%>–hozeh, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2382>Hazaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3114>Joiarib<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8023>Shiloni<s%>.

All the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.

And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; <S%H5543>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3133>Joed<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H384>Ithiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3470>Jesaiah<s%>.
And <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H1373>Gabbai<s%>, <S%H5543>Sallai<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>.

And <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%> was their <S%H6496>overseer<s%>: and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Senuah<s%> was <S%H4932>second<s%> over the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
Of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3114>Joiarib<s%>, <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>.

<S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, was the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>: and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6421>Pelaliah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%>,

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>: and <S%H6023>Amashai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5832>Azareel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H273>Ahasai<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%>,

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>: and their <S%H6496>overseer<s%> was <S%H2068>Zabdiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of one of the great <S%H1419>men<s%>.

Also of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hashub<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1138>Bunni<s%>;

And <S%H7678>Shabbethai<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, had the oversight of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Micha<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, was the <S%H7218>principal<s%> to <S%H8462>begin<s%> the <S%H3034>thanksgiving<s%> in <S%H8605>prayer<s%>: and <S%H1229>Bakbukiah<s%> the <S%H4932>second<s%> among his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H5653>Abda<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8051>Shammua<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>.
All the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, and their <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%>.

And the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, were in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
But the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel<s%>: and <S%H6727>Ziha<s%> and <S%H1658>Gispa<s%> were over the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>.

The <S%H6496>overseer<s%> also of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Micha<s%>. Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, the <S%H7891>singers<s%> were <S%H5048>over<s%> the <S%H4399>business<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
For it was the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment<s%> concerning <S%H548>them<s%>, that a certain portion should be for the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, <S%H1697>due<s%> for every <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H6611>Pethahiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabeel<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, was at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> in all <S%H1697>matters<s%> concerning the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And for the <S%H2691>villages<s%>, with their <S%H7704>fields<s%>, some of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H7153>Kirjath<s%>–arba, and in the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H1769>thereof<s%>, and at Dibon, and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> <S%H3343>thereof<s%>, and at Jekabzeel, and in the villages <S%H1323>thereof<s%>,
And at <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, and at <S%H4137>Moladah<s%>, and at <S%H1046>Beth<s%>–phelet,
And at <S%H2705>Hazar<s%>–shual, and at <S%H884>Beer<s%>–sheba, and in the villages <S%H1323>thereof<s%>,
And at <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, and at <S%H4368>Mekonah<s%>, and in the villages <S%H1323>thereof<s%>,
And at <S%H5884>En<s%>–rimmon, and at <S%H6881>Zareah<s%>, and at <S%H3412>Jarmuth<s%>,

<S%H2182>Zanoah<s%>, <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>, and in their <S%H2691>villages<s%>, at <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, and the <S%H7704>fields<s%> <S%H5825>thereof<s%>, at Azekah, and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> <S%H2583>thereof<s%>. And they dwelt from <S%H884>Beer<s%>–sheba unto the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> also of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> dwelt at <S%H4363>Michmash<s%>, and <S%H5857>Aija<s%>, and <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, and in their <S%H1323>villages<s%>,
And at <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, <S%H5011>Nob<s%>, <S%H6055>Ananiah<s%>,
<S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, <S%H1664>Gittaim<s%>,
<S%H2307>Hadid<s%>, <S%H6650>Zeboim<s%>, <S%H5041>Neballat<s%>,
<S%H3850>Lod<s%>, and <S%H207>Ono<s%>, the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2791>craftsmen<s%>.
And of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H4256>divisions<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.
